top_comments.comment: The terraforming contrasts very nicely with the Octagon. I didn’t think of snow until you mentioned it. It’s at it’s awkward stage that all art goes through. The coral will bring it to life …or death really.
That intro song never gets old

comments_since_last_sample.body: The carnival-esk music during the shadow box training.... Beautiful!

the "pay in barrel" sign maybe too far from shulker because I think most of hermits just come in and look at the middle (shulker and stuff that you sale) not side or above that's why they didn't see the sign , Put it directly on top of shulker say "pay in barrel above" is more likely to see and maybe help?

Please give some likes to rendog to appreciate all the hard work
100k views but less than 10k like .....
I miss the turning gear noise from your intro

The terraforming contrasts very nicely with the Octagon. I didn’t think of snow until you mentioned it. It’s at it’s awkward stage that all art goes through. The coral will bring it to life …or death really.
